org.eclipse.scada.configuration.infrastructure.provider

Class UserEntryItemProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • ItemProviderAdapter
      • org.eclipse.scada.configuration.infrastructure.provider.UserEntryItemProvider

  • public class UserEntryItemProvider
extends ItemProviderAdapter
    This is the item provider adapter for a UserEntry object.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      UserEntryItemProvider(AdapterFactory adapterFactory)
      This constructs an instance from a factory and a notifier.
